title.narrative: WASH Emergency response for cholera epidemic in the Far North and North Regions of Cameroon

description.narrative: ? The coordination and monitoring capacities of the Government and WASH partners in Far North region are reinforced in WASH emergency response. ? 100% of affected households are disinfected by Red Cross within 24 hours of reported case ? 100% of suspected wells and those at/near affected households are disinfected by Red Cross within 24 hours of reported case ? 20% of general disinfection conducted by Govt health/sanitation services ? Monthly Govt-partner monitoring ? The partnership between the Ministry of Health, WHO, UNICEF, Cameroon Red Cross and the communities is strengthened. ? Revised Govt-partner contingency plan draft produced by end of first quarter 2011 ? Contingency stocks available in vulnerable districts by end of first quarter 2011 ? Joint water points/health center mapping completed by end of first quarter 2011
